data.message:
Can you help? I received an email saying that you are REMOVING a page I manage because a Vimeo was reported as violating copyright. 
I have NO idea what they are talking about, not sure about any Vimeo, so I believe this is a hoax, but how can I be sure? 

I sure don't want to lose my page! Do you have an address I can forward said email?

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out, Liz. You can confirm that you’ve been contacted by a Facebook representative by asking them to send you an email. Facebook representatives will have an @sales.fb.com, @support.facebook.com or @fb.com email address. All 3 email addresses are valid and only originate from authorized representatives of Facebook. Let us know if there’s anything else we can help you with. Thanks! -Brittany
